 10#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_DISTRIBUTED_BLOCK_HPP
 11#define VSIP_IMPL_DISTRIBUTED_BLOCK_HPP
 12
 13#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 14#include <vsip/dense.hpp>
 15#include <vsip/core/map_fwd.hpp>
 16#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/core/domain_utils.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/parallel/get_local_view.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/parallel/proxy_local_block.hpp>

 21namespace vsip
 22{
 23namespace impl
 24{
 25
 26template <typename Block,
 27	  typename Map>
 28class Distributed_block
 29  : public impl::Ref_count<Distributed_block<Block, Map> >
 30{
 31  // Compile-time values and types.
 32public:
 33  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
 34
 35  typedef typename Block::value_type           value_type;
 36  typedef typename Block::reference_type       reference_type;
 37  typedef typename Block::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
 38
 39  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::complex_type impl_complex_type;
 40  typedef Storage<impl_complex_type, value_type>     impl_storage_type;
 41  typedef typename impl_storage_type::type           impl_data_type;
 42  typedef typename impl_storage_type::const_type     impl_const_data_type;
 43
 44  typedef Map                                  map_type;
 45
 46  // Non-standard typedefs:
 47  typedef Block                                local_block_type;
 48  typedef typename Block_layout<local_block_type>::layout_type
 49                                               local_LP;
 50  typedef Proxy_local_block<dim, value_type, local_LP>  proxy_local_block_type;
 51
 52  // Private compile-time values and types.
 53private:
 54  enum private_type {};
 55  typedef typename impl::Complex_value_type<value_type, private_type>::type uT;
 56  typedef typename impl::Complex_value_type<value_type, private_type>::ptr_type
 57          uT_ptr;
 58
 59  // Constructors and destructor.
 60public:
 61  Distributed_block(Domain<dim> const& dom, Map const& map = Map())
 62    : map_           (map),
 63      proc_          (local_processor()),
 64      sb_            (map_.subblock(proc_)),
 65      subblock_      (NULL)
 66  {
 67    map_.impl_apply(dom);
 68    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
 69      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
 70
 71    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
 72      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
 73                           : empty_domain<dim>();
 74
 75    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom);
 76  }
 77
 78  Distributed_block(Domain<dim> const& dom, value_type value,
 79		    Map const& map = Map())
 80    : map_           (map),
 81      proc_          (local_processor()),
 82      sb_            (map_.subblock(proc_)),
 83      subblock_      (NULL)
 84  {
 85    map_.impl_apply(dom);
 86    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
 87      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
 88
 89    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
 90      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
 91                           : empty_domain<dim>();
 92
 93    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, value);
 94  }
 95
 96  Distributed_block(
 97    Domain<dim> const& dom, 
 98    value_type* const  ptr,
 99    Map const&         map = Map())
100    : map_           (map),
101      proc_          (local_processor()),
102      sb_            (map_.subblock()),
103      subblock_      (NULL)
104  {
105    map_.impl_apply(dom);
106    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
107      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
108
109    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
110      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
111                           : empty_domain<dim>();
112
113    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, ptr);
114  }
115
116  Distributed_block(
117    Domain<dim> const& dom, 
118    uT_ptr const       pointer,
119    Map const&         map = Map())
120    : map_           (map),
121      proc_          (local_processor()),
122      sb_            (map_.subblock()),
123      subblock_      (NULL)
124  {
125    map_.impl_apply(dom);
126    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
127      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
128
129    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
130      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
131                           : empty_domain<dim>();
132
133    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, pointer);
134  }
135
136  Distributed_block(
137    Domain<dim> const& dom, 
138    uT_ptr const       real_pointer,
139    uT_ptr const       imag_pointer,
140    Map const&         map = Map())
141    : map_           (map),
142      proc_          (local_processor()),
143      sb_            (map_.subblock()),
144      subblock_      (NULL)
145  {
146    map_.impl_apply(dom);
147    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
148      size_[d] = dom[d].length();
149
150    Domain<dim> sb_dom = 
151      (sb_ != no_subblock) ? map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_)
152                           : empty_domain<dim>();
153
154    subblock_ = new Block(sb_dom, real_pointer, imag_pointer);
155  }
156
157
158  ~Distributed_block()
159  {
160    if (subblock_)
161    {
162      // PROFILE: issue a warning if subblock is captured.
163      subblock_->decrement_count();
164    }
165  }
166    
167  // Data accessors.
168public:
169  // get() on a distributed_block is a broadcast.  The processor
170  // owning the index broadcasts the value to the other processors in
171  // the data parallel group.
172  value_type get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
173  {
174    // Optimize uni-processor and replicated cases.
175    if (    Type_equal<Map, Global_map<1> >::value
176        ||  vsip::num_processors() == 1
177	|| (   Type_equal<Map, Replicated_map<1> >::value
178	    && map_.subblock() != no_subblock))
179      return subblock_->get(idx);
180
181    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<1>(idx));
182    processor_type pr = *(map_.processor_begin(sb));
183    value_type     val = value_type(); // avoid -Wall 'may not be initialized'
184
185    if (pr == proc_)
186    {
187      assert(map_.subblock() == sb);
188      index_type lidx = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx);
189      val = subblock_->get(lidx);
190    }
191
192    map_.impl_comm().broadcast(pr, &val, 1);
193
194    return val;
195  }
196
197  value_type get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1) const VSIP_NOTHROW
198  {
199    // Optimize uni-processor and replicated cases.
200    if (    Type_equal<Map, Global_map<2> >::value
201        ||  vsip::num_processors() == 1
202	|| (   Type_equal<Map, Replicated_map<2> >::value
203	    && map_.subblock() != no_subblock))
204      return subblock_->get(idx0, idx1);
205
206    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(
207				Index<2>(idx0, idx1));
208    processor_type pr = *(map_.processor_begin(sb));
209    value_type     val = value_type(); // avoid -Wall 'may not be initialized'
210
211    if (pr == proc_)
212    {
213      assert(map_.subblock() == sb);
214      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
215      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
216      val = subblock_->get(l_idx0, l_idx1);
217    }
218
219    map_.impl_comm().broadcast(pr, &val, 1);
220
221    return val;
222  }
223
224  value_type get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2)
225    const VSIP_NOTHROW
226  {
227    // Optimize uni-processor and replicated cases.
228    if (    Type_equal<Map, Global_map<3> >::value
229        ||  vsip::num_processors() == 1
230	|| (   Type_equal<Map, Replicated_map<3> >::value
231	    && map_.subblock() != no_subblock))
232      return subblock_->get(idx0, idx1, idx2);
233
234    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(
235				Index<3>(idx0, idx1, idx2));
236    processor_type pr = *(map_.processor_begin(sb));
237    value_type     val = value_type(); // avoid -Wall 'may not be initialized'
238
239    if (pr == proc_)
240    {
241      assert(map_.subblock() == sb);
242      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
243      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
244      index_type l_idx2 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(2, idx2);
245      val = subblock_->get(l_idx0, l_idx1, l_idx2);
246    }
247
248    map_.impl_comm().broadcast(pr, &val, 1);
249
250    return val;
251  }
252
253
254  // put() on a distributed_block is executed only on the processor
255  // owning the index.
256  void put(index_type idx, value_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
257  {
258    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<1>(idx));
259
260    if (map_.subblock() == sb)
261    {
262      index_type lidx = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx);
263      subblock_->put(lidx, val);
264    }
265  }
266
267  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, value_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
268  {
269    index_type sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<2>(idx0, idx1));
270
271    if (map_.subblock() == sb)
272    {
273      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
274      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
275      subblock_->put(l_idx0, l_idx1, val);
276    }
277  }
278
279  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2, value_type val)
280    VSIP_NOTHROW
281  {
282    index_type     sb = map_.impl_subblock_from_global_index(
283				Index<3>(idx0, idx1, idx2));
284
285    if (map_.subblock() == sb)
286    {
287      index_type l_idx0 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(0, idx0);
288      index_type l_idx1 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(1, idx1);
289      index_type l_idx2 = map_.impl_local_from_global_index(2, idx2);
290      subblock_->put(l_idx0, l_idx1, l_idx2, val);
291    }
292  }
293
294
295  // Support Direct_data interface.
296public:
297  impl_data_type       impl_data()       VSIP_NOTHROW
298  { return subblock_->impl_data(); }
299
300  impl_const_data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW
301  { return subblock_->impl_data(); }
302
303  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type D, dimension_type d)
304    const VSIP_NOTHROW
305  { return subblock_->impl_stride(D, d); }
306
307
308  // Accessors.
309public:
310  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW;
311  length_type size(dimension_type, dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
312  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
313    { return map_; }
314
315  // length_type num_local_blocks() const { return num_subblocks_; }
316
317  Block& get_local_block() const
318  {
319    assert(subblock_ != NULL);
320    return *subblock_;
321  }
322
323  index_type subblock() const { return sb_; }
324
325  void assert_local(index_type sb) const
326    { assert(sb == sb_ && subblock_ != NULL); }
327
328  // User storage functions.
329public:
330  void admit(bool update = true) VSIP_NOTHROW
331    { subblock_->admit(update); }
332
333  void release(bool update = true) VSIP_NOTHROW
334    { subblock_->release(update); }
335
336  void release(bool update, value_type*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
337    { subblock_->release(update, pointer); }
338  void release(bool update, uT*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
339    { subblock_->release(update, pointer); }
340  void release(bool update, uT*& real_pointer, uT*& imag_pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
341    { subblock_->release(update, real_pointer, imag_pointer); }
342
343  void find(value_type*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
344    { subblock_->find(pointer); }
345  void find(uT*& pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
346    { subblock_->find(pointer); }
347  void find(uT*& real_pointer, uT*& imag_pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
348    { subblock_->find(real_pointer, imag_pointer); }
349
350  void rebind(value_type* pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
351    { subblock_->rebind(pointer); }
352  void rebind(uT* pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
353    { subblock_->rebind(pointer); }
354  void rebind(uT* real_pointer, uT* imag_pointer) VSIP_NOTHROW
355    { subblock_->rebind(real_pointer, imag_pointer); }
356
357  enum user_storage_type user_storage() const VSIP_NOTHROW
358  { return subblock_->user_storage(); }
359
360  bool admitted() const VSIP_NOTHROW
361    { return subblock_->admitted(); }
362
363  // Member data.
364public:
365  map_type              map_;
366  processor_type	proc_;			// This processor in comm.
367  index_type   		sb_;
368  Block*		subblock_;
369  length_type	        size_[dim];
370};
371
372
373
374/// Specialize block layout trait for Distributed_blocks.
375template <typename BlockT,
376	  typename MapT>
377struct Block_layout<Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> >
378{
379  static dimension_type const dim = Block_layout<BlockT>::dim;
380
381  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::access_type  access_type;
382  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type   order_type;
383  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::pack_type    pack_type;
384  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type complex_type;
385
386  typedef Layout<dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
387};
388
389
390
391/// Specialize Distributed_local_block traits class for Distributed_block.
392template <typename Block,
393	  typename Map>
394struct Distributed_local_block<Distributed_block<Block, Map> >
395{
396  typedef Block type;
397};
398
399
400
401/// Specialize Is_simple_distributed_block traits class for Distributed_block.
402template <typename Block,
403	  typename Map>
404struct Is_simple_distributed_block<Distributed_block<Block, Map> >
405{
406  static bool const value = true;
407};
408
409
410
411#if VSIP_IMPL_USE_GENERIC_VISITOR_TEMPLATES==0
412
413/// Specialize Combine_return_type for Distributed_block leaves.
414template <typename CombineT,
415	  typename BlockT,
416	  typename MapT>
417struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> >
418{
419  typedef Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> block_type;
420  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
421		type;
422  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
423		tree_type;
424};
425
426
427
428/// Specialize apply_combine for Distributed_block leaves.
429template <typename CombineT,
430	  typename BlockT,
431	  typename MapT>
432typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> >::type
433apply_combine(
434  CombineT const&                        combine,
435  Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> const& block)
436{
437  return combine.apply(block);
438}
439
440#endif
441
442
443
444/***********************************************************************
445  Definitions
446***********************************************************************/
447
448
449/// Return the total size of the block.
450template <typename Block,
451	  typename Map>
452inline length_type
453Distributed_block<Block, Map>::size()
454  const VSIP_NOTHROW
455{
456  length_type size = 1;
457  for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
458    size *= size_[d];
459  return size;
460}
461
462
463
464/// Return the size of the block in a specific dimension.
465///
466/// Parameters:
467///   :block_dim: selects which block-dimensionality
468///               (BLOCK_DIM == Block::dim).
469///   :d: is the dimension whose length to return (0 <= d < block_dim).
470///
471/// Returns:
472///   The size of dimension d.
473template <typename Block,
474	  typename Map>
475inline
476length_type
477Distributed_block<Block, Map>::size(
478  dimension_type block_dim,
479  dimension_type d)
480  const VSIP_NOTHROW
481{
482  assert(block_dim == dim);
483  assert(d < dim);
484  return size_[d];
485}
486
487
488
489/// Return the local block for a given subblock.
490
491#if 0
492// For now, leave this undefined catches unhandled distributed cases at
493// compile-time.
494template <typename BlockT>
495typename Distributed_local_block<BlockT>::type&
496get_local_block(
497  BlockT const& /*block*/)
498{
499  // In general case, we should assume block is not distributed and
500  // just return it.
501  //
502  // For now, through exception to catch unhandled distributed cases.
503  VSIP_IMPL_THROW(impl::unimplemented("get_local_block()"));
504}
505#endif
506
507
508
509template <typename BlockT,
510	  typename MapT>
511BlockT&
512get_local_block(
513  Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> const& block)
514{
515  return block.get_local_block();
516}
517
518

520#if 0
521// For now, leave this undefined catches unhandled distributed cases at
522// compile-time.
523template <typename BlockT>
524void
525assert_local(
526  BlockT const& /*block*/,
527  index_type    sb)
528{
529  // In general case, we should assume block is not distributed and
530  // just return it.
531  //
532  // For now, through exception to catch unhandled distributed cases.
533  VSIP_IMPL_THROW(impl::unimplemented("assert_local()"));
534}
535#endif
536
537
538
539template <typename BlockT,
540	  typename MapT>
541void
542assert_local(
543  Distributed_block<BlockT, MapT> const& block,
544  index_type                             sb)
545{
546  block.assert_local(sb);
547}
